thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unbelievable hotel
thread.title_full: Unbelievable hotel - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Peter N
title: Unbelievable hotel
text: This was our third time staying at the Artemide in Rome. We would not consider any other place. Not only is it absolutely beautiful and the rooftop terrace breathtaking, but they make you feel like you are the most important guest in the hotel . All of the stuff is wonderful ! We would like to particularly think Paolo and Pasquale, Who were particularly helpful and always so attentive. We cannot say enough how much we recommend this hotel
